FuncDef: This command displays statistics for DHCP relay and DHCP snooping.

ParaDef.Info: Displays statistics for the specified IP interface.

msg: Error CLI:statistics iom ( <slot> | all ) [ host | session | subscriber | summary ] [ non-zero-value-only ]
Error CLI:statistics mda ( <mda> | all ) [ host | session | subscriber | summary ] [ non-zero-value-only ]
Error CLI:statistics port ( <port-id> | all ) [ host | session | subscriber | summary ] [ non-zero-value-only ]
Error CLI:statistics pw-port ( <pw-port> | all ) [ host | session | subscriber | summary ] [ non-zero-value-only ]
